title: Green Dragonborn

Green Dragonborn Physical Appearance:

the green dragonborn is a rare variant among dragonborn, known for its green scaly skin and nature-related abilities. They are usually skilled in druidic magic and have a natural affinity with plants and animals.Green dragonborn have scaly skin that is green in color, with shades ranging from light green to dark green. They have a body structure similar to that of a human, but with reptilian features such as yellow or gold eyes
